_source.text: According to the Washington Post, Pollard's supporters have asked Prime Minister Netanyahu to ask President Obama at their Monday meeting-which was reportedly better than expected and lasted 45 minutes longer than scheduled-to use his executive power to waive the parole condition and allow the released spy to go to his new home.
